靾字的基本解释

靾
xiè
古代魂车上所陈设的马缰绳：“荐乘车，鹿浅幦，干、笮、革靾。”
古代魂车上陈设的马鞍。

靾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yì］
［《廣韻》餘制切，去祭，以。］
古代魂车上所陈设的马缰。

靾字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【革字部】　靾； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1386第26
【廣韻】餘制切【集韻】以制切，?音裔。【廣韻】以馬鞍贈亡人。【集韻】博雅：?、靾、駻，鞌也。　又【集韻】許罽切，音?。馬被具。或作?，亦書作?。　又私列切，音薛。義同。　又【儀禮·旣夕】薦乗車，鹿淺幦，干、笮、革靾。【註】靾，韁革也。【釋文】靾，息列反。

靾字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
靾字的起名意思

暂无。

Salamander
Basic explanation of words
Salamander
xiè
The horse reins placed on the ancient soul cart: "Recommend to ride, deer Qianhuan, Gan, Ruo, and leather salamander."
The saddle displayed on the ancient soul chariot.
Salamander
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yì］
["Guangyun" more than cut, go to sacrifice, to. ]
The reins of horses placed on the ancient spirit chariots.
Salamander
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【Department of Leather Characters】　靾; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1386 Page 26
[Guang Yun] Yu Zhiqi [Ji Yun] to make cutting,? Yin Yi. [Guang Yun] Gift the dead with a saddle. [Ji Yun] Boya:?, 駻, 駻, 鞌 Ye.　[Jiyun] Xu Fengqie, sound?. Horse quilt. Or for?, also book as?.　Separately cut again, Yin Xue. The same meaning.　[Yi Li·Xi Xi] Recommend to take a car, Lu Qianhuan, Gan, Ruo, Leather Lu. [Note] Salamander, rein leather also. 【Explanation】Salamander, rest on the contrary.
